members.name: position
members.description: The byte offset at which the next write to the file will occur. This must be no greater than length.A newly-created FileWriter must have position set to 0.

members.name: length
members.description: The length of the file. If the user does not have read access to the file, this must be the highest byte offset at which the user has written.

members.name: write
members.description: Write the supplied data to the file at position.

members.name: seek
members.description: Seek sets the file position at which the next write will occur.

params.name: offset
params.description: If nonnegative, an absolute byte offset into the file. If negative, an offset back from the end of the file.

members.name: truncate
members.description: Changes the length of the file to that specified. If shortening the file, data beyond the new length must be discarded. If extending the file, the existing data must be zero-padded up to the new length.

params.name: size
params.description: The size to which the length of the file is to be adjusted, measured in bytes.
